page.title: 05 Woodland
page.content:
The biggest wood in the area is Great Covert which has a path through it called Dirty Drive. The trees are mainly coniferous Pine and Spruce with some deciduous Oak and Beech.
The area is quite flat with many paths through it. There are many animals in the area including pheasants, grass snakes, rabbits, deer, squirrels and badgers. Shot guns are used to scare away and kill rabbits and other farm pests.
We saw the following types of flowers primrose, bluebells and daisies.
There is also a small game reserve.
Some of the woodland is being cut down for residential purposes.
